reactSection.headline: specialized in creating sleek and premium user interface with the help of react.

nodeSection.headline: responsible for creating secure and scalable web services with the help  of nodejs and mongodb

creations.name: Molecule-UI
creations.description: A collection of three packages @moleculeui/react, @molecule/styles, and @moleculeui/icons. @moleculeui/icons contains 190+ Icon components written in react. @moleculeui/react contains 10+ components for react projects. @moleculeui/styles contains a complete set of utilities for more than 25+ css properties

creations.name: Molecule-Chat-API
creations.techStack: nodejs, expressjs, jwt, bcrypt, mongodb, handlebars
creations.description: A REST API built using the ExpressJS. Implements a highly secure messaging service using JWT and stores hash passwords using bcrypt and uses mongoDb as a database, with caching done using redis. Uses S3 to store user images. Deployed for production and staging on EBS.

creations.name: Natours
creations.techStack: nodejs, expressjs, jwt, bcrypt, mongodb, pug, nodemailer
creations.description: A SSR e-commerce website built for learning purpose. Uses expressJS as a server framework and PUG Template engine for HTML rendering. Uses MongoDB as a Database, nodemailer for sending mails using GMAIL and stripe as a payment gateway

creations.name: Poke Dex
creations.description: Poke-DEX is a near about replica of the device shown in Pokemon the SHOW. It uses the Poke-api-v2 for the data and axios along with redux for data fetching and state-management along with browser local-storage to save liked pokemons

creations.name: Todo-app
creations.description: A Simple TOdo-app build using react and redux, with firebase as a backend. Uses firebase authentication with email and password, google auth and facebook auth. Uses Firebase Firestore as database. HTML 5 canvas API to generate a image with initial.

creations.name: Mini-Project-Collection
creations.description: Mini-project is a collection of typically one-day projects built using vanilla JS, HTML and CSS. no batteries used
